net.consensys.cava.crypto.sodium

Class KeyDerivation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.crypto.sodium.KeyDerivation

  • public final class KeyDerivation
extends java.lang.Object
    Key derivation.

    Multiple secret subkeys can be derived from a single master key.

    Given the master key and a key identifier, a subkey can be deterministically computed. However, given a subkey, an attacker cannot compute the master key nor any other subkeys.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        public static boolean isAvailable()
        Check if Sodium and key derivation support is available.

        Key derivation is supported in sodium native library version >= 10.0.12.

        Returns:
        true if Sodium and key derivation support is available.

      • contextLength

        public static int contextLength()
        Returns:
        The required length for the context (8).

      • minSubKeyLength

        public static int minSubKeyLength()
        Returns:
        The minimum length for a new sub key (16).

      • maxSubKeyLength

        public static int maxSubKeyLength()
        Returns:
        The maximum length for a new sub key (64).
